summary: A jazz musician and a stunt man are the spitting image of two millionaire brothers. They take the job to replace them in Rio de Janeiro when someone plans to assassinate them.
cast: Terence Hill|Bud Spencer|April Clough|Harold Bergman|C.V. Wood Jr.|Dary Reis|Nello Pazzafini|José Van de Kamp|Fernando Amaral|Roberto Roney|Athayde Arcoverde|Claudioney Penedo|Dennis Bourke|Giancarlo Bastianoni|Franco Sattamini|Sergio Smacchi|Franco Ukmar
keywords: domestic servant|punch in the face|two cousins|private jet|rich man
title: Dos súper dos
